provider.name: BIS TV HD
provider.servicehacks:
# Some HD services are not properly identified as such by service_type or by name. hd_services = ( 'TF1', 'FRANCE 2', 'CANAL+', 'FRANCE 5', 'M6', 'ARTE', 'C8', 'W9', 'TMC', 'NT1', 'NRJ12', 'LCP', 'FRANCE 4', 'BFM TV', 'CNEWS', 'CSTAR', 'GULLI', 'HD1', "L'EQUIPE", '6TER', 'NUMERO 23' 'RMC DECOUVERTE', 'CHERIE 25', 'RTL9', 'AB 1', 'BEIN SPORTS 1', 'BEIN SPORTS 2', 'TREK', 'ANIMAUX', 'SCIENCE ET VIE', 'AB MOTEURS', 'ACTION', 'TV8 MONT BLANC', )
if service["service_type"] == 1 and (service["service_name"][0:8] == 'FRANCE 3' or service["service_name"] in hd_services): service["service_type"] = 25
